r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.7M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with SUSE Software Solutions Canada. The average
  contract duration was 1.22 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.0M. The longest
  contract was 3 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $7.4M.
lookup_name: 'SUSE SOFTWARE SOLUTIONS CANADA'

s431_number_of_contracts: '8'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '12%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '175%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '3'

s424_mean_duration: '1.22'
s421_mean_contract_value: '1.0M'
s425_max_duration: '3'
s422_max_contract_value: '7.4M'
